text: As countries begin rolling out #Covid19 #Vaccine programmes worldwide, research by Nikhil Vellodi (@PSEinfo) & Joshua Weiss (@IIES_Sthlm @Stockholm_Uni) analyses optimum policies and suggests where to prioritise vaccine allocation. In Issue 65 #CovidEcon: https://t.co/BvyAtn2yQj https://t.co/s5bxYjmCvP
